channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-9370|2024-08-05T17:02:44.374Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20workspaces%20server%3B%20watchdox%20by%20blackberry%20server
item.description: An information disclosure / elevation of privilege vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could potentially allow an attacker who has legitimate access to BlackBerry Workspaces to gain access to another user's workspace by making multiple login requests to the server.

item.title: CVE-2017-3892|2024-08-05T14:39:41.193Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform%20%28qnx%20sdp%29
item.description: In BlackBerry QNX Software Development Platform (SDP) 6.6.0, an information disclosure vulnerability in the default configuration of the QNX SDP could allow an attacker to gain information relating to memory layout that could be used in a blended attack by executing commands targeting procfs resources.

item.title: CVE-2017-9371|2024-08-05T17:02:44.372Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform%20%28qnx%20sdp%29
item.description: In BlackBerry QNX Software Development Platform (SDP) 6.6.0 and 6.5.0 SP1 and earlier, a loss of integrity vulnerability in the default configuration of the QNX SDP could allow an attacker being able to reduce the entropy of the PRNG, making other blended attacks more practical by gaining control over environmental factors that influence seed generation.

item.title: CVE-2017-9367|2024-08-05T17:02:44.376Z -- blackberry -- workspaces%20server
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could potentially allow an attacker to execute or upload arbitrary files, or reveal the content of arbitrary files anywhere on the web server by crafting a URL with a manipulated POST request.

item.title: CVE-2018-8891|2024-08-05T07:10:46.960Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20uem
item.description: Multiple stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM versions earlier than 12.9.1 could allow an attacker to store script commands that could later be executed in the context of another Management Console administrator.

item.title: CVE-2017-9369|2024-08-05T17:02:44.381Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform%20%28qnx%20sdp%29
item.description: In BlackBerry QNX Software Development Platform (SDP) 6.6.0 and 6.5.0 SP1 and earlier, an information disclosure vulnerability in the default configuration of the QNX SDP could allow an attacker to gain information relating to memory layout of higher privileged processes by manipulating environment variables that influence the loader.

item.title: CVE-2018-8889|2024-08-05T07:10:47.065Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20enterprise%20mobility%20server%20%28bems%29
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in the Connect Service of the BlackBerry Enterprise Mobility Server (BEMS) 2.8.17.29 and earlier could allow an attacker to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of a BEMS administrator account.

item.title: CVE-2018-8888|2024-08-05T07:10:46.639Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20uem
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM versions earlier than 12.10.0 could allow an attacker to store script commands that could later be executed in the context of another Management Console administrator.

item.title: CVE-2018-8892|2024-08-05T07:10:46.755Z -- blackberry -- blackberry%20uem
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM versions earlier than 12.9.1 could allow an attacker to make modifications to the UEM settings in the context of a Management Console administrator.

item.title: CVE-2017-3891|2024-08-05T14:39:41.298Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform%20%28qnx%20sdp%29
item.description: In BlackBerry QNX Software Development Platform (SDP) 6.6.0, an elevation of privilege vulnerability in the default configuration of the QNX SDP with QNet enabled on networks comprising two or more QNet nodes could allow an attacker to access local and remote files or take ownership of files on other QNX nodes regardless of permissions by executing commands targeting arbitrary nodes from a secondary QNX 6.6.0 QNet node.

item.title: CVE-2018-8890|2024-08-05T07:10:46.910Z -- blackberry -- uem
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry UEM 12.8.0 and 12.8.1 could allow an attacker to take over a UEM user's session and perform administrative actions in the context of the user.

item.title: CVE-2017-17442|2024-08-05T20:51:31.411Z -- blackberry -- uem%20management%20console
item.description: In BlackBerry UEM Management Console version 12.7.1 and earlier, a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute script commands in the context of the affected UEM Management Console account by crafting a malicious link and then persuading a user with legitimate access to the Management Console to click on the malicious link.

item.title: CVE-2017-3893|2024-08-05T14:39:41.483Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform%20%28qnx%20sdp%29
item.description: In BlackBerry QNX Software Development Platform (SDP) 6.6.0, the default configuration of the QNX SDP system did not in all circumstances prevent attackers from modifying the GOT or PLT tables with buffer overflow attacks.

item.title: CVE-2017-3894|2024-08-05T14:39:41.190Z -- blackberry -- unified%20endpoint%20manager
item.description: A stored cross site scripting vulnerability in the Management Console of BlackBerry Unified Endpoint Manager version 12.6.1 and earlier, and all versions of BES12, allows attackers to execute actions in the context of a Management Console administrator by uploading a malicious script and then persuading a target administrator to view the specific location of the malicious script within the Management Console.

item.title: CVE-2017-9368|2024-08-05T17:02:44.383Z -- blackberry -- workspaces%20server
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could result in an attacker gaining access to source code for server-side applications by crafting a request for specific files.

item.title: CVE-2024-35213|2024-08-02T03:07:46.687Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in the SGI Image Codec of QNX SDP version(s) 6.6, 7.0, and 7.1 could allow an attacker to potentially cause a denial-of-service condition or execute code in the context of the image processing process.

item.title: CVE-2024-35213|2024-06-11T18:37:04.161Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in the SGI Image Codec of QNX SDP version(s) 6.6, 7.0, and 7.1 could allow an attacker to potentially cause a denial-of-service condition or execute code in the context of the image processing process.

item.title: CVE-2024-35213|2024-06-27T20:11:10.901Z -- blackberry -- qnx%20software%20development%20platform
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in the SGI Image Codec of QNX SDP version(s) 6.6, 7.0, and 7.1 could allow an attacker to potentially cause a denial-of-service condition or execute code in the context of the image processing process.
